title: how to ensure the latest WSL is running after windows update ?
body:
sorry if this is the wrong place for questions and support
i have received the 1709 windows update
afaict wsl is still running fine but has it been upgraded, too ?
how can i tell ?
should i uninstall then reinstall from the store ? would i then still be running 16.04 as i'd rather stay on the LTS release ...
